errors.error_description: The command provided to install from GitHub, `pip install git://github.com/rlberry-py/rlberry.git`, uses an incorrect protocol `git://`. The correct format for pip is `git+https://`.
correction_candidates: git clone https://github.com/rlberry-py/rlberry.git && cd rlberry && pip install .

errors.error_description: The README suggests installing an old version of NumPy (`<1.20`) for compatibility, which is likely to cause dependency conflicts with `rlberry` and other modern libraries.
correction_candidates: Remove the note and the command suggesting to downgrade NumPy.
Change the command to `pip install numpy --upgrade`.
Keep the note, as older NumPy versions are required for certain legacy systems.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the note and the command suggesting to downgrade NumPy.
